name: Grim Fandango Remastered
description:
Grim Fandango's epic story of four years in the life (or death) of Manny Calavera, travel agent to the dead, has been remastered to look, sound, and control even better than when it won GameSpot's Game of the Year award upon its original launch.

Remastered version includes:

• Repainted, hi-res character textures
• New, dynamic lighting 
• Classic score re-recorded with a full live orchestra
• Over 2 hours of exclusive developer commentary
• Concept art browser
intro: One of the most acclaimed adventure games of all time is now back, better than ever.
